attributes.action: Stop the housing development of 975 houses on the back of Beccles/Ellough
attributes.background: 975 houses placed on what is now a beautiful site, would disrupt traffic in Beccles would be a eye sore for the next ten years minimum, as the houses wouldn't be put up over night, it is sale of the first wave of houses dependant, they might not sell as quick furthering the time of development.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
